mapper.select: select receiptid, orderdate, memberid from receiptlistview where memberid = #{memberId} order by orderdate desc
mapper.update: update orderdetail set orderstatus = #{status} where orderid = #{orderId}
mapper.select: select addressId, nickname, recipient, address, contact from deliveryaddress where memberId = #{memberId} and isdefault = 1
mapper.insert: insert into deliveryaddress(memberid, nickname, recipient, address, contact, isdefault) values(#{memberId}, #{nickName}, #{recipient}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{isDefault})
mapper.delete: delete from deliveryaddress where memberId = #{memberId} and addressid = #{addressId}
mapper.update: update deliveryaddress set isdefault = 1 where memberId = #{memberId} and addressId = #{addressId}
update deliveryaddress set isdefault = 0 where memberId = #{memberId}
